trans-unit.source: A trigger action that removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que remove um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> with a <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para remover um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, Remove, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar, remover ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, remove, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar, remover ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> action to remove any storyboards begun with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> ação para remover qualquer storyboards iniciadas com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>.

trans-unit.source: It's also a good idea to remove background animations when the object they animate is no longer being used.
trans-unit.target: Também é uma boa ideia para remover as animações de plano de fundo quando o objeto que eles animam não está sendo usado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply an indefinitely repeating storyboard using an element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event, you should also create an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> that uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> action to remove the storyboard on the element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você aplicar um storyboard indefinidamente repetição usando um elemento <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> eventos, você também deve criar um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> que usa um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> ação para remover o storyboard no elemento de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to remove a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to stop it from continuing when the user navigates away from the page containing the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como remover um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> para interrompê-la de continuar quando o usuário navega para fora a página que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard" />.
